content: molar coaster deidre eyles © july 3 2007 these molar coasters make a cute gift for your favourite dentist or hygienist using crochet thread will make a size suitable for a pin yarn i used white ww cotton but you could use any yarn hook suitable for your yarn make an magic_ring by wrapping the yarn around 2 fingers twice chain 2 does not count as 1st st 12 double_crochet into the ring then pull tail tight join with a slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet roots- chain 11 working in bumps on back of chain single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and next 2 chain half_double_crochet in next 3 chain double_crochet in next 3 chain skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st repeat single_crochet in next 2 double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet 3dc in next double_crochet slip_stitch in next double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet in next double_crochet slip_stitch in next double_crochet 3dc half_double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 9 sts along root 3 single_crochet in tip of root half_double_crochet in next 9 sts along root skip 1 st half_double_crochet in next 9 sts along 2nd root 3 single_crochet in tip of root skip 1 st half_double_crochet in next 13 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts half_double_crochet single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts slip_stitch in next st single_crochet half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 4 sts slip_stitch in next 2 sts fasten_off and weave in ends
